name: flakrat-repo_epel
author: flakrat
summary: Configures the EPEL Yum repository config to point to a local mirror on Enterprise Linux (RHEL, CentOS) clients
description:
Based off of http://github.com/stahnma/puppet-module-puppetlabs_yum

Manages the EPEL repository

============================================
Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux (or EPEL) is a Fedora Special
Interest Group that creates, maintains, and manages a high quality
set of additional packages for Enterprise Linux, including, but
not limited to, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL),CentOS and
Scientific Linux (SL).
http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/EPEL
============================================
